titles: A letter to a dissenter, upon occasion of His Majesties late gracious declaration of indulgence
author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Halifax, George Savile. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Freedom of religion --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
